availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leon Talandier (Oldham County, Kentucky, liquor dealer)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, liquor dealer. Native of France. Married to Susan Estill Talandier in Oldham County, Kentucky in May 1853. Father of Alfred Talandier and Benjamin Talandier. Liquor dealer in Oldham County in 1860. Household owned fourteen enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 895.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 170A-B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film 000482449.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994051, Oldham County Births.
